A context can be made current against a given surface by calling makeCurrent(). When OpenGL rendering is done, call swapBuffers() to swap the front and back buffers of the surface, so that the newly rendered content becomes visible. To be able to support certain platforms, QOpenGLContext requires that you call makeCurrent() again before starting rendering a new frame, after calling swapBuffers().
trans-unit.target: 通过调用makeCurrent（），可以使上下文在给定表面上成为当前电流。完成OpenGL渲染后，调用swapBuffers（）交换表面的前后缓冲区，以便新渲染的内容可见。为了能够支持某些平台，QOpenGLContext要求您在调用swapBuffers（）之后开始渲染新帧之前再次调用makeCurrent（）。

trans-unit.source: A context can be made current against a given surface by calling makeCurrent(). When OpenGL rendering is done, call swapBuffers() to swap the front and back buffers of the surface, so that the newly rendered content becomes visible. To be able to support certain platforms, QOpenGLContext requires that you call makeCurrent() again before starting rendering a new frame, after calling swapBuffers().

trans-unit.source: A control element performs an action or displays information to the user. Examples of control elements are push buttons, check boxes, and header sections in tables and tree views. Control elements are not necessarily complete widgets such as push buttons, but can also be widget parts such as tab bar tabs and scroll bar sliders. They differ from primitive elements in that they are not passive, but fill a function in the interaction with the user. Controls that consist of several elements often use the style to calculate the bounding rectangles of the elements. The available sub elements are defined by the SubElement enum. This enum is only used for calculating bounding rectangles; sub elements are not graphical elements to be drawn like primitive, control, and complex elements.
trans-unit.target: 控件执行操作或向用户显示信息。控件元素的示例是表格和树视图中的按钮，复选框和标题部分。控件元素不一定是完整的窗口小部件，例如按钮，但也可以是窗口小部件，例如标签栏标签和滚动条滑块。它们与原始元素的不同之处在于它们不是被动的，而是在与用户的交互中起到了作用。由多个元素组成的控件通常使用样式来计算元素的边界矩形。可用的子元素由SubElement枚举定义。该枚举仅用于计算边界矩形。子元素不是要绘制的图形元素，例如原始元素，控件元素和复杂元素。

A cookie can also have an expiration date, indicating its validity. If the expiration date is not present, the cookie is considered a "session cookie" and should be discarded when the application exits (or when its concept of session is over).

trans-unit.source: A cookie is set by a remote server when it replies to a request and it expects the same cookie to be sent back when further requests are sent.

trans-unit.source: A cookie that is "HttpOnly" is only set and retrieved by the network requests and replies; i.e., the HTTP protocol. It is not accessible from scripts running on browsers.

A default UTC time zone backend is provided which is always guaranteed to be available. This provides a set of generic Offset From UTC time zones in the range UTC-14:00 to UTC+14:00. trans-unit.source: A delegate checks whether an item is editable before creating an editor. The model must let the delegate know that its items are editable. trans-unit.source: A delegate defines how individual data elements should appear as visual items in the view. The models expose a set of data roles and the delegate uses them to construct a visual item. The delegate may also define behaviour such as an operation to invoke when a visual item is clicked.

trans-unit.source: A delegate should specify its size using implicitWidth and implicitHeight. The TableView lays out the items based on that information. Explicit width or height settings are ignored and overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 委托应使用隐式宽度和隐式高度指定其大小。该TableView中勾画出基于该信息的项目。显式的宽度或高度设置将被忽略并覆盖。

trans-unit.source: A dialog is a popup mostly used for short-term tasks and brief communications with the user. Similarly to ApplicationWindow and Page, Dialog is organized into three sections: header, contentItem, and footer.
trans-unit.target: 对话框是一个弹出窗口，主要用于短期任务和与用户的简短通信。类似于ApplicationWindow和Page，Dialog分为三个部分：header，contentItem和footer。

trans-unit.source: A dialog is a popup mostly used for short-term tasks and brief communications with the user. Similarly to ApplicationWindow and Page, Dialog is organized into three sections: header, contentItem, and footer.
A dialog is always a top-level widget, but if it has a parent, its default location is centered on top of the parent. It will also share the parent's taskbar entry.
trans-unit.target: 对话框始终是一个顶层小组件,但如果它有一个父节点,它的默认位置是在父节点的顶部居中。它还将共享父节点的任务栏条目。

trans-unit.source: A dialog that lets the user choose a color.
trans-unit.target: 一个让用户选择颜色的对话框。

trans-unit.source: A dialog window is a top-level window mostly used for short-term tasks and brief communications with the user. QDialogs may be modal or modeless. QDialogs can provide a return value, and they can have default buttons. QDialogs can also have a QSizeGrip in their lower-right corner, using setSizeGripEnabled().
trans-unit.target: 对话窗口是顶层窗口，主要用于短期任务和与用户的简短通信。QDialogs可以是模式对话框或无模式对话框。QDialogs可以提供返回值，并且可以具有默认按钮。QDialogs也可以有QSizeGrip在其右下角，使用setSizeGripEnabled（）。

trans-unit.source: A directional light
trans-unit.target: 方向灯

trans-unit.source: A directional light effectively have no position, so moving it does not have any effect. The light will always be emitted in the direction of the light's Z axis.

A directional light is a light source that behaves similar to sunlight. The light from a directional light hits all objects from the same direction and with the same intensity, regardless of where they are in the scene.

A directory listing qmldir file distinctly different from a module definition qmldir file. A directory listing qmldir file allows a group of QML documents to be quickly and easily shared, but it does not define a type namespace into which the QML object types defined by the documents are registered, nor does it support versioning of those QML object types.
trans-unit.target: 列出 qmldir 文件的目录与模块定义qmldir文件明显不同。目录列表 qmldir 文件允许快速方便地共享一组QML文档，但是它没有定义将文档定义的QML对象类型注册到的类型名称空间，也不支持这些QML对象类型的版本控制。

trans-unit.source: A directory listing qmldir file distinctly different from a module definition qmldir file. A directory listing qmldir file allows a group of QML documents to be quickly and easily shared, but it does not define a type namespace into which the QML object types defined by the documents are registered, nor does it support versioning of those QML object types.

A directory listing qmldir file distinctly different from a module definition qmldir file. A directory listing qmldir file allows a group of QML documents to be quickly and easily shared, but it does not define a type namespace into which the QML object types defined by the documents are registered, nor does it support versioning of those QML object types.
A directory model that displays the contents of a default directory is usually constructed with a parent object:
trans-unit.target: 显示默认目录内容的目录模型通常是以父对象构建的。

trans-unit.source: A directory of QML files can also be imported from a remote location if the directory contains a directory listing qmldir file.
trans-unit.target: 的QML文件的目录，也可以从远程位置，如果该目录包含一个目录列表导入 qmldir 文件。

trans-unit.source: A directory which contains QML documents may also be imported directly in a QML document. This provides a simple way for QML types to be segmented into reusable groupings: directories on the filesystem.
trans-unit.target: 包含QML文档的目录也可以直接导入QML文档中。这就为QML类型提供了一种简单的方法,将其划分为可重用的分组:文件系统上的目录。

trans-unit.source: A directory's path can be obtained with the path() function, and a new path set with the setPath() function. The absolute path to a directory is found by calling absolutePath().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用path（）函数获取目录的路径，并使用setPath（）函数获取新路径。通过调用absolutePath（），可以找到目录的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: A disabled button does not react to user interaction, and is also visually disabled.
trans-unit.target: 被禁用的按钮对用户的交互没有反应,也是视觉上的禁用。

trans-unit.source: A discovered configuration can be immediately used to create a new QNetworkSession. An example of a discovered configuration could be a WLAN which is within in range. If the device moves out of range the discovered flag is dropped. A second example is a GPRS configuration which generally remains discovered for as long as the device has network coverage. A configuration that has this state is also in state QNetworkConfiguration::Defined. If the configuration is a service network this flag is set if at least one of the underlying access points configurations has the Discovered state.
trans-unit.target: 发现的配置可以立即用于创建新的QNetworkSession。发现的配置的示例可以是范围内的WLAN。如果设备移出范围，发现的标志将被丢弃。第二个示例是GPRS配置，只要该设备具有网络覆盖范围，它通常就会一直被发现。具有此状态的配置也处于QNetworkConfiguration :: Defined状态。如果配置是服务网络，则如果至少一个基础接入点配置具有“发现”状态，则设置此标志。

trans-unit.source: A discovered configuration can be immediately used to create a new QNetworkSession. An example of a discovered configuration could be a WLAN which is within in range. If the device moves out of range the discovered flag is dropped. A second example is a GPRS configuration which generally remains discovered for as long as the device has network coverage. A configuration that has this state is also in state QNetworkConfiguration::Defined. If the configuration is a service network this flag is set if at least one of the underlying access points configurations has the Discovered state.
A disk-based QWebEngineProfile should be destroyed on or before application exit, otherwise the cache and persistent data may not be fully flushed to disk.
trans-unit.target: 基于磁盘的QWebEngineProfile应该在应用程序退出时或退出之前销毁，否则缓存和持久性数据可能不会完全刷新到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: A disk-based QWebEngineProfile should be destroyed on or before application exit, otherwise the cache and persistent data may not be fully flushed to disk.
A document can also be created from a stored binary representation using fromBinaryData() or fromRawData().
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用fromBinaryData（）或fromRawData（）从存储的二进制表示形式创建文档。

trans-unit.source: A document can also be created from a stored binary representation using fromBinaryData() or fromRawData().

A document can be queried as to whether it contains an array or an object using isArray() and isObject(). The array or object contained in the document can be retrieved using array() or object() and then read or manipulated.
trans-unit.target: 使用isArray（）和isObject（）可以查询文档是否包含数组或对象。可以使用array（）或object（）检索文档中包含的数组或对象，然后对其进行读取或操作。

trans-unit.source: A document has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 文件已被载入。

trans-unit.source: A document is composed of a list of blocks, represented by QTextBlock objects. Each block can contain an item of some kind, such as a paragraph of text, a table, a list, or an image. Every block has an associated QTextBlockFormat that specifies its characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 文档由以QTextBlock对象表示的块列表组成。每个块可以包含某种项目，例如文本段落，表格，列表或图像。每个块都有一个关联的QTextBlockFormat，用于指定其特征。

trans-unit.source: A document is composed of a list of blocks, represented by QTextBlock objects. Each block can contain an item of some kind, such as a paragraph of text, a table, a list, or an image. Every block has an associated QTextBlockFormat that specifies its characteristics.
A document load has been stopped.

trans-unit.source: A document must import the necessary modules or type namespaces to enable the engine to load the QML object types referenced within the document. By default, a document can access any QML object types that have been defined through .qml files in the same directory; if a document needs to refer to any other object types, it must import the type namespace into which those types have been registered.
trans-unit.target: 文档必须导入必要的模块或类型名称空间，以使引擎能够加载文档中引用的QML对象类型。默认情况下，文档可以访问通过同一目录中的 .qml 文件定义的任何QML对象类型。如果文档需要引用任何其他对象类型，则必须导入已将这些类型注册到的类型名称空间。

trans-unit.source: A document, for example in an office application.

trans-unit.source: A drag can also be started manually using startDrag.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用startDrag手动开始拖动。

trans-unit.source: A drag can be terminated either by canceling it with Drag.cancel() or setting Drag.active to false, or it can be terminated with a drop event by calling Drag.drop(). If the drop event is accepted, Drag.drop() will return the drop action chosen by the recipient of the event, otherwise it will return Qt.IgnoreAction.
trans-unit.target: 拖动可通过用Drag取消来终止。cancel（）或将Drag.active设置为false，或者可以通过调用Drag以drop事件终止它。drop（）。如果接受放置事件，请拖动。drop（）将返回事件接收者选择的放置动作，否则将返回Qt.IgnoreAction。

trans-unit.source: A drag will be applied to moving objects which is this factor of their current velocity.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳将被应用到移动的物体上,也就是它们当前速度的这个系数。

trans-unit.source: A drop shadow effect renders the source with a drop shadow. The color of the drop shadow can be modified using the setColor() function. The drop shadow offset can be modified using the setOffset() function and the blur radius of the drop shadow can be changed with the setBlurRadius() function.
trans-unit.target: 投影效果将使用投影效果渲染源。可以使用setColor（）函数修改投影的颜色。可以使用setOffset（）函数修改投影偏移量，并可以使用setBlurRadius（）函数更改投影的模糊半径。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic property was added, changed, or removed from the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象中添加、更改或删除了一个动态属性。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic replica is initially created as a "bare" QObject - that is, it has no properties, signals or slots. QtRO returns the API for the object during initialization (after the connection to the source is made), thus the API is added to the object at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 动态副本最初是作为“裸” QObject创建的-也就是说，它没有属性，信号或插槽。QtRO在初始化过程中（建立到源的连接之后）返回对象的API，因此API在运行时被添加到对象。

trans-unit.target: 超过1.0的系数会放大到视图中,0.0和1.0之间的系数会放大到视图中。

trans-unit.source: A factory can also be set in certain frameworks that support multiple connections, such as QNetworkAccessManager. When set on such object, the factory will be queried for sockets created by that framework only.
trans-unit.target: 也可以在支持多个连接的某些框架中设置工厂，例如QNetworkAccessManager。在此类对象上设置时，将仅查询该框架创建的套接字的工厂。

trans-unit.source: A factory can also reimplement the registerClass() and unregisterClass() functions to set additional flags for an ActiveX control in the registry. To limit the number of methods or properties a widget class exposes from its parent classes reimplement exposeToSuperClass().
trans-unit.target: 工厂还可以重新实现registerClass（）和unregisterClass（）函数，以在注册表中为ActiveX控件设置其他标志。要限制窗口小部件类从其父类公开的方法或属性的数量，请重新实现ExposureToSuperClass（）。

trans-unit.target: 一个工厂，用于从编译时已知的文件（即通过 <invoke> 中的 src 属性指定的文件）实例化SCXML状态机。

trans-unit.source: A factory keeps a collection of QItemEditorCreatorBase instances, which are specialized editors that produce editors for one particular QVariant data type (All Qt models store their data in QVariants).

A factory keeps a collection of QItemEditorCreatorBase instances, which are specialized editors that produce editors for one particular QVariant data type (All Qt models store their data in QVariants).

trans-unit.source: A feature of QSharedPointer that can be enabled at compile-time for debugging purposes is a pointer tracking mechanism. When enabled, QSharedPointer registers in a global set all the pointers that it tracks. This allows one to catch mistakes like assigning the same pointer to two QSharedPointer objects.
trans-unit.target: 可以在编译时启用以进行调试的QSharedPointer功能是指针跟踪机制。启用后，QSharedPointer会将其跟踪的所有指针注册到全局集中。这样一来，就可以捕获错误，例如将相同的指针分配给两个QSharedPointer对象。

trans-unit.source: A filter section contains the actual documentation. One Qt help project file may contain more than one filter sections. Every filter section consists of four parts, the filter attributes section, the table of contents, the keywords and the files list. In theory all parts are optional but not specifying anything there will result in an empty documentation set.
trans-unit.target: 一个过滤区包含了实际的文档,一个Qt帮助项目文件可能包含多个过滤区。一个Qt帮助项目文件可能包含多个过滤区。每个过滤器部分由四个部分组成,过滤器属性部分,目录,关键字和文件列表。理论上,所有的部分都是可选的,但如果不在其中指定任何内容,将导致一个空的文档集。

trans-unit.source: A final state is used to communicate that (part of) a StateMachine has finished its work. When a final top-level state is entered, the state machine's finished() signal is emitted. In general, when a final substate (a child of a State) is entered, the parent state's finished() signal is emitted. FinalState is part of The Declarative State Machine Framework.
trans-unit.target: 最终状态用于传达StateMachine（部分）已完成其工作的信息。当进入最终的顶层状态时，将发出状态机的finish（）信号。通常，当输入最终子状态（一个州的子级）时，将发出父州的finish（）信号。FinalState是声明式状态机框架的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A final state is used to communicate that (part of) a StateMachine has finished its work. When a final top-level state is entered, the state machine's finished() signal is emitted. In general, when a final substate (a child of a State) is entered, the parent state's finished() signal is emitted. FinalState is part of The Declarative State Machine Framework.

A final state is used to communicate that (part of) a QStateMachine has finished its work. When a final top-level state is entered, the state machine's finished() signal is emitted. In general, when a final substate (a child of a QState) is entered, the parent state's finished() signal is emitted. QFinalState is part of The State Machine Framework.
trans-unit.target: 最终状态用于传达QStateMachine（的一部分）已完成工作的信息。当进入最终的顶层状态时，将发出状态机的finish（）信号。一般情况下，最后的子状态（的孩子时QState输入），父状态的结束（）信号被发射。QFinalState是状态机框架的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A final state is used to communicate that (part of) a QStateMachine has finished its work. When a final top-level state is entered, the state machine's finished() signal is emitted. In general, when a final substate (a child of a QState) is entered, the parent state's finished() signal is emitted. QFinalState is part of The State Machine Framework.

trans-unit.source: A flat button typically does not draw a background unless it is pressed or checked.
trans-unit.target: 扁平按钮通常不会绘制背景,除非它被按下或选中。

trans-unit.source: A flat combo box button does not draw a background unless it is interacted with. In comparison to normal combo boxes, flat combo boxes provide looks that make them stand out less from the rest of the UI. For instance, when placing a combo box into a tool bar, it may be desirable to make the combo box flat so it matches better with the flat looks of tool buttons.
trans-unit.target: 扁平组合框按钮不会绘制背景,除非与之交互。与普通的组合框相比,扁平的组合框提供的外观使其与UI的其他部分不那么突出。例如,当把一个组合框放入工具条中时,可能需要把组合框做成扁平的,这样才能更好地与工具按钮的扁平外观相匹配。

trans-unit.source: A floating dock widget is presented to the user as an independent window "on top" of its parent QMainWindow, instead of being docked in the QMainWindow.
trans-unit.target: 浮动坞窗口小部件作为独立窗口显示在其父QMainWindow的 “顶部” ，而不是停靠在QMainWindow中。

trans-unit.source: A floating point value that is either an infinity or NaN will be converted to a null JSON value. Since Qt 6.0, QJsonValue can store the full precision of any 64-bit signed integer without loss, but in previous versions values outside the range of ±2^53 may lose precision. Unsigned 64-bit values greater than or equal to 2^63 will either lose precision or alias to negative values, so QMetaType::ULongLong should be avoided.

A fluid and modern UI is key for any application's success in today's world, and that's where QML makes so much sense for a designer or developer. Qt offers the most basic UI controls that are necessary to create a fluid and modern-looking UI. It is recommended to browse this list of UI controls before creating your own custom UI control.
trans-unit.target: 在当今世界,流畅和现代的UI是任何应用程序成功的关键,这也是QML对设计师或开发人员的意义所在。Qt提供了最基本的UI控件,这些控件对于创建一个流畅和现代的UI是必要的。建议在创建自己的自定义UI控件之前,先浏览一下这个UI控件列表。

A form loader object, provided by the QUiLoader class, is used to construct the user interface. This user interface can be retrieved from any QIODevice. For example, a QFile object can be used to obtain a form stored in a project's resources. The QUiLoader::load() function takes the user interface description contained in the file and constructs the form widget.
trans-unit.target: QUiLoader类提供的表单加载器对象用于构造用户界面。可以从任何QIODevice检索此用户界面。例如，可以使用QFile对象来获取存储在项目资源中的表单。所述QUiLoader ::负载（）函数包含在文件中的用户接口描述并构建表单控件。

trans-unit.source: A format has a FormatType which specifies the kinds of text item it can format; e.g. a block of text, a list, a table, etc. A format also has various properties (some specific to particular format types), as described by the Property enum. Every property has a corresponding Property.
trans-unit.target: 格式具有 FormatType ，它指定可以格式化的文本项的类型；例如，一个文本块，一个列表，一个表格等。一种格式还具有各种属性（某些属性特定于特定的格式类型），如Property枚举所述。每个属性都有一个对应的属性。

trans-unit.source: A format that is used to specify a foreground or background brush/color for the selection.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定选区前景或背景画笔/颜色的格式。

trans-unit.source: A format's object index can be set with setObjectIndex(), and retrieved with objectIndex(). These methods can be used to associate the format with a QTextObject. It is used to represent lists, frames, and tables inside the document.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用setObjectIndex（）设置格式的对象索引，并使用objectIndex（）进行检索。这些方法可用于将格式与QTextObject关联。它用于表示文档中的列表，框架和表格。

trans-unit.source: A format's properties can be set with the setProperty() functions, and retrieved with boolProperty(), intProperty(), doubleProperty(), and stringProperty() as appropriate. All the property IDs used in the format can be retrieved with allPropertyIds(). One format can be merged into another using merge().
trans-unit.target: 可以使用setProperty（）函数设置格式的属性，并根据需要使用boolProperty（），intProperty（），doubleProperty（）和stringProperty（）进行检索。可以使用allPropertyIds（）检索格式中使用的所有属性ID。可以使用merge（）将一种格式合并为另一种格式。

trans-unit.source: A fragment's text and character format can be obtained with the text() and charFormat() functions. The length() function gives the length of the text in the fragment. position() gives the position in the document of the start of the fragment. To determine whether the fragment contains a particular position within the document, use the contains() function.
trans-unit.target: 片段的文本和字符格式可以使用text（）和charFormat（）函数获得。的长度（）函数给出了在片段中的文本的长度。position（）给出片段开始位置在文档中的位置。要确定片段是否在文档中包含特定位置，请使用contains（）函数。

trans-unit.source: A frequent requirement is to remove spacing characters from a byte array ('\n', '\t', ' ', etc.). If you want to remove spacing from both ends of a QByteArray, use trimmed(). If you want to also replace each run of spacing characters with a single space character within the byte array, use simplified(). Only ASCII spacing characters are recognized for these purposes.

A frequent requirement is to remove whitespace characters from a byte array ('\n', '\t', ' ', etc.). If you want to remove whitespace from both ends of a QByteArray, use trimmed(). If you want to remove whitespace from both ends and replace multiple consecutive whitespaces with a single space character within the byte array, use simplified().
trans-unit.target: 常见的要求是从字节数组中删除空格字符（'\ n'，'\ t'，''等）。如果要从QByteArray的两端删除空格，请使用trimmed（）。如果要从两端删除空格，并用字节数组中的单个空格字符替换多个连续的空格，请使用简化（）。

trans-unit.source: A frequent requirement is to remove whitespace characters from a byte array ('\n', '\t', ' ', etc.). If you want to remove whitespace from both ends of a QByteArray, use trimmed(). If you want to remove whitespace from both ends and replace multiple consecutive whitespaces with a single space character within the byte array, use simplified().

A frequent requirement is to remove whitespace characters from a string ('\n', '\t', ' ', etc.). If you want to remove whitespace from both ends of a QString, use the trimmed() function. If you want to remove whitespace from both ends and replace multiple consecutive whitespaces with a single space character within the string, use simplified().
trans-unit.target: 常见的要求是从字符串（'\ n'，'\ t'，''等）中删除空格字符。如果要从QString的两端删除空格，请使用trimped（）函数。如果要从两端删除空格，并用字符串中的单个空格字符替换多个连续的空格，请使用简化（）。

trans-unit.source: A geocoding query in QML is performed using the GeocodeModel type. For an address-to-coordinate query, its query property may be set to either an Address object or a string containing the textual form of the address to search for. To perform the reverse, the same property can be set to a coordinate instead. Results are made available in the contents of the model.
trans-unit.target: 使用GeocodeModel类型执行QML中的地理编码查询。对于地址到坐标的查询，其 query 属性可以设置为Address对象或包含要搜索的地址文本形式的字符串。要执行相反的操作，可以将相同的属性设置为坐标。结果在模型的内容中可用。

trans-unit.source: A gradient is a smooth transition between colors. There are two types of gradients: linear and radial. Gradients must have two or more color stops, representing color shifts positioned from 0 to 1 between to the gradient's starting and end points or circles.
trans-unit.target: 渐变是颜色之间的平滑过渡。有两种类型的梯度:线性和径向。梯度必须有两个或更多的颜色停止点,代表梯度的起始点和结束点或圆圈之间从0到1的颜色偏移。

trans-unit.source: A gradient is defined by two or more colors, which are blended seamlessly. The colors are specified as a set of GradientStop child items, each of which defines a position on the gradient (from 0.0 to 1.0), and a color. The position of each GradientStop is defined by the position property. The color is defined by the color property.
trans-unit.target: 渐变是由两种或多种颜色定义的，这些颜色可以无缝混合。将颜色指定为一组GradientStop子项，每个子项定义渐变上的位置（从0.0到1.0）和一种颜色。每个GradientStop的位置由position属性定义。颜色由color属性定义。

A grapheme cluster is a sequence of two or more Unicode characters that form one indivisible entity on the screen. For example the latin character `Ä' can be represented in Unicode by two characters, `A' (0x41), and the combining diaresis (0x308). A text cursor can only validly be positioned before or after these two characters, never between them since that wouldn't make sense. In indic languages every syllable forms a grapheme cluster.
trans-unit.target: 字素簇是两个或多个Unicode字符的序列，它们在屏幕上形成一个不可分割的实体。例如，拉丁字符“Ä”可以用两个字符“ A”（0x41）和组合偏音符（0x308）表示为Unicode。文本光标只能有效地定位在这两个字符之前或之后，而不能在它们之间定位，因为这没有意义。在印度语中，每个音节形成一个字素簇。

trans-unit.source: A guarded pointer will automatically cast to a T *, so you can freely mix guarded and unguarded pointers. This means that if you have a QPointer<QWidget>, you can pass it to a function that requires a QWidget *. For this reason, it is of little value to declare functions to take a QPointer as a parameter; just use normal pointers. Use a QPointer when you are storing a pointer over time.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的指针将自动转换为 T *，因此您可以自由地混合受保护和不受保护的指针。这意味着，如果您有QPointer < QWidget >，则可以将其传递给需要QWidget * 的函数。因此，声明以QPointer作为参数的函数几乎没有价值。只需使用普通的指针即可。长时间存储指针时，请使用QPointer。

trans-unit.source: A guarded pointer will automatically cast to a T *, so you can freely mix guarded and unguarded pointers. This means that if you have a QPointer<QWidget>, you can pass it to a function that requires a QWidget *. For this reason, it is of little value to declare functions to take a QPointer as a parameter; just use normal pointers. Use a QPointer when you are storing a pointer over time.

A guarded pointer will automatically cast to a T *, so you can freely mix guarded and unguarded pointers. This means that if you have a QPointer<QWidget>, you can pass it to a function that requires a QWidget *. For this reason, it is of little value to declare functions to take a QPointer as a parameter; just use normal pointers. Use a QPointer when you are storing a pointer over time.

A guarded pointer, QPointer<T>, behaves like a normal C++ pointer T *, except that it is automatically cleared when the referenced object is destroyed (unlike normal C++ pointers, which become "dangling pointers" in such cases). T must be a subclass of QObject.
trans-unit.target: 受保护的指针QPointer <T>的行为与普通的C ++指针 T * 相似，除了在销毁引用的对象时会自动清除它（不同于普通的C ++指针，在这种情况下，C ++指针变为“悬空指针”）。 T 必须是QObject的子类。

trans-unit.source: A history state is a pseudo-state that represents the child state that the parent state was in the last time the parent state was exited. A transition with a history state as its target is in fact a transition to one of the other child states of the parent state. HistoryState is part of The Declarative State Machine Framework.
trans-unit.target: 历史状态是一个伪状态，代表父状态是上一次退出父状态时的子状态。实际上，以历史状态为目标的转换实际上是向父状态的其他子状态之一的转换。HistoryState是声明式状态机框架的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A history state is a pseudo-state that represents the child state that the parent state was in the last time the parent state was exited. A transition with a history state as its target is in fact a transition to one of the other child states of the parent state. HistoryState is part of The Declarative State Machine Framework.

A history state is a pseudo-state that represents the child state that the parent state was in the last time the parent state was exited. A transition with a history state as its target is in fact a transition to one or more other child states of the parent state. QHistoryState is part of The State Machine Framework.
trans-unit.target: 历史状态是伪状态，代表父状态是上一次退出父状态时的子状态。实际上，以历史状态为目标的转换是到父状态的一个或多个其他子状态的转换。QHistoryState是状态机框架的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A history state is a pseudo-state that represents the child state that the parent state was in the last time the parent state was exited. A transition with a history state as its target is in fact a transition to one or more other child states of the parent state. QHistoryState is part of The State Machine Framework.

A history state is created as a child of the state for which we wish to record the current child state; when the state machine detects the presence of such a state at runtime, it automatically records the current (real) child state when the parent state exits. A transition to the history state is in fact a transition to the child state that the state machine had previously saved; the state machine automatically "forwards" the transition to the real child state.
trans-unit.target: 历史状态是作为我们希望记录当前子状态的状态的子状态创建的;当状态机在运行时检测到这种状态的存在时,它会在父状态退出时自动记录当前(真实)子状态。向历史状态的过渡实际上是向状态机之前保存的子状态的过渡;状态机会自动 "转发 "到真实子状态的过渡。

trans-unit.source: A history state is created as a child of the state for which we wish to record the current child state; when the state machine detects the presence of such a state at runtime, it automatically records the current (real) child state when the parent state is exited. A transition to the history state is in fact a transition to the child state that the state machine had previously saved; the state machine automatically "forwards" the transition to the real child state.
trans-unit.target: 历史状态是作为我们希望记录当前子状态的状态的子状态创建的;当状态机在运行时检测到这种状态的存在时,它会在父状态退出时自动记录当前(真实)子状态。向历史状态的过渡,实际上是向状态机之前保存的子状态的过渡;状态机会自动 "转发 "到真实的子状态。

A host node will share the list of sources it hosts with every other node that connects to it. It will send updates when sources are added or removed from the list. In this way, a connected node will always know what sources it can attach to. Changes to a specific Source are only propagated to nodes that have a replica of that source. This avoids unnecessary network traffic.
trans-unit.target: 主机节点将与与其连接的所有其他节点共享其主机的源列表。从列表中添加或删除源时，它将发送更新。这样，连接的节点将始终知道其可以附加到哪些源。对特定源的更改仅传播到具有该源副本的节点。这样可以避免不必要的网络流量。

trans-unit.source: A host node will share the list of sources that it hosts with every other node that connects to it. This host sends updates when sources are added to or removed from the list. In this way, a connected node will always know what sources it can attach itself to. Changes to a specific source are only propagated to nodes that have a replica of that source. Consequently, this avoids any unnecessary network traffic.

trans-unit.source: A key event contains a special accept flag that indicates whether the receiver will handle the key event. This flag is set by default for QEvent::KeyPress and QEvent::KeyRelease, so there is no need to call accept() when acting on a key event. For QEvent::ShortcutOverride the receiver needs to explicitly accept the event to trigger the override. Calling ignore() on a key event will propagate it to the parent widget. The event is propagated up the parent widget chain until a widget accepts it or an event filter consumes it.
trans-unit.target: 按键事件包含一个特殊的接受标志，该标志指示接收方是否将处理按键事件。默认情况下，此标志是为QEvent :: KeyPress和QEvent :: KeyRelease设置的，因此在执行键事件时无需调用accept（）。对于QEvent :: ShortcutOverride，接收者需要显式接受事件以触发覆盖。在键事件上调用ignore（）会将其传播到父窗口小部件。该事件将在父窗口小部件链中传播，直到窗口小部件接受它或事件过滤器将其使用为止。

trans-unit.source: A large image takes more memory bandwidth when being traversed as a texture.

A layer is rendered with the root item's opacity being 1, and then the root item's opacity is applied to the texture when it is drawn. This means that fading in a large item hierarchy from transparent to opaque, or vice versa, can be done without the overlap artifacts that the normal item by item alpha blending has. Here is the same example with layer enabled:
trans-unit.target: 渲染一个图层时,根项的不透明度为1,然后在绘制纹理时将根项的不透明度应用到纹理上。这意味着,在一个大的项目层次结构中,从透明到不透明的渐变,或者反之亦然,可以在没有普通项目逐个项目alpha混合的重叠伪影的情况下完成。下面是启用图层后的同一个例子。

trans-unit.source: A layout is used to arrange and manage the elements that make up a user interface. Qt provides a number of classes to automatically handle layouts -- QHBoxLayout, QVBoxLayout, QGridLayout, and QFormLayout. These classes solve the challenge of laying out widgets automatically, providing a user interface that behaves predictably. Fortunately knowledge of the layout classes is not required to arrange widgets with
trans-unit.target: 布局用于安排和管理组成用户界面的元素。Qt提供了许多类以自动处理布局- QHBoxLayout，负责，QVBoxLayout，QGridLayout和QFormLayout。这些类解决了自动布局窗口小部件的难题，提供了行为可预测的用户界面。幸运的是，不需要使用布局类来安排带有

trans-unit.source: A limited, pure software based rendering path is available as well. With the software backend, a number of Qt Quick features are not available, QML items relying on these will not be rendered at all. At the same time, this allows QQuickWindow to be functional even on systems where there is no 3D graphics API available at all. See Qt Quick Software Adaptation for more details.

trans-unit.source: A linked Windows resource file may contain many elements that can be accessed by its EXE or DLL. However, the Qt resource system should be used for accessing linked-in resources in a platform-independent way. But some standard elements of the linked Windows resource file are accessed by Windows itself. For example, in Windows explorer the version tab of the file properties is filled by resource elements. In addition, the program icon of the EXE is read from these elements. So it is good practice for a Qt created Windows EXE or DLL to use both techniques at the same time: link platform-independent resources via the Qt resource system and add Windows specific resources via a Windows resource file.
trans-unit.target: 链接的Windows资源文件可能包含许多可由其EXE或DLL访问的元素。但是，应使用Qt资源系统以独立于平台的方式访问链接的资源。但是链接的Windows资源文件的某些标准元素可由Windows本身访问。例如，在Windows资源管理器中，文件属性的版本选项卡由资源元素填充。另外，从这些元素中读取EXE的程序图标。因此，对于Qt创建的Windows EXE或DLL，最好同时使用两种技术：通过Qt资源系统链接与平台无关的资源，并通过Windows资源文件添加Windows特定的资源。

trans-unit.source: A list contains a sequence of text blocks, each of which is marked with a bullet point or other symbol. Multiple levels of lists can be used, and the automatic numbering feature provides support for ordered numeric and alphabetical lists.
trans-unit.target: 列表包含一连串的文本块,每个文本块都用一个圆点或其他符号标记。可以使用多级列表,自动编号功能支持有序的数字和字母列表。

trans-unit.target: 列表由一个或多个项目组成,用文本块表示。列表的格式指定了列表中的项目的外观,特别是决定了每个项目的缩进和样式。特别是,它决定了每个项目的缩进和样式。

trans-unit.source: A list of QLowEnergyAdvertisingParameters::AddressInfo instances is passed to QLowEnergyAdvertisingParameters::setWhiteList(). White lists are used to restrict the devices which have the permission to interact with the peripheral. The permitted type of interaction is defined by QLowEnergyAdvertisingParameters::FilterPolicy.

trans-unit.source: A list of other sprites and weighted transitions to them, for example {"a":1, "b":2, "c":0} would specify that one-third should transition to sprite "a" when this sprite is done, and two-thirds should transition to sprite "b" when this sprite is done. As the transitions are chosen randomly, these proportions will not be exact. With "c":0 in the list, no sprites will randomly transition to "c", but it wll be a valid path if a sprite goal is set.
trans-unit.target: 其他精灵的列表和对它们的加权过渡,例如{"a":1,"b":2,"c":0}将指定当这个精灵完成时,三分之一应该过渡到精灵 "a",当这个精灵完成时,三分之二应该过渡到精灵 "b"。由于过渡是随机选择的,所以这些比例不会是精确的。当列表中的 "c":0时,没有精灵会随机过渡到 "c",但如果设置了精灵目标,它将是一个有效的路径。

trans-unit.source: A list of pixel formats a surface can present is given by the supportedPixelFormats() function, and the isFormatSupported() function will test if a video surface format is supported. If a format is not supported the nearestFormat() function may be able to suggest a similar format. For example, if a surface supports fixed set of resolutions it may suggest the smallest supported resolution that contains the proposed resolution.
trans-unit.target: 表面可以呈现的像素格式列表由supportedPixelFormats（）函数给出，isFormatSupported（）函数将测试是否支持视频表面格式。如果不支持某种格式，则NearestFormat（）函数可能会建议类似的格式。例如，如果某个表面支持一组固定的分辨率，则它可能建议包含所建议分辨率的最小支持分辨率。

trans-unit.source: A list of texts is passed to the constructor. A signal mapper is constructed and for each text in the list a QPushButton is created. We connect each button's clicked() signal to the signal mapper's map() slot, and create a mapping in the signal mapper from each button to the button's text. Finally we connect the signal mapper's mapped() signal to the custom widget's clicked() signal. When the user clicks a button, the custom widget will emit a single clicked() signal whose argument is the text of the button the user clicked.
trans-unit.target: 文本列表将传递给构造函数。构造一个信号映射器，并为列表中的每个文本创建一个QPushButton。我们将每个按钮的 clicked() 信号连接到信号映射器的map（）插槽，然后在信号映射器中创建从每个按钮到该按钮的文本的映射。最后，我们将信号映射器的mapd（）信号连接到自定义小部件的 clicked() 信号。当用户单击按钮时，自定义窗口小部件将发出一个 clicked() 信号，其参数是用户单击的按钮的文本。

trans-unit.source: A list of texts is passed to the constructor. A signal mapper is constructed and for each text in the list a QPushButton is created. We connect each button's clicked() signal to the signal mapper's map() slot, and create a mapping in the signal mapper from each button to the button's text. Finally we connect the signal mapper's mappedString() signal to the custom widget's clicked() signal. When the user clicks a button, the custom widget will emit a single clicked() signal whose argument is the text of the button the user clicked.

trans-unit.source: A local connection - supports connections between processes on the same device. This type of connection can have less overhead, depending on the underlying Operating System features.

A local directory of QML files can be imported without any additional setup or configuration. A remote directory of QML files can also be imported, but requires a directory listing qmldir file to exist. A local directory may optionally contain a directory listing qmldir file in order to define the type names which should be provided to clients which import the directory, and to specify JavaScript resources which should be made available to importers.
trans-unit.target: 可以导入QML文件的本地目录，而无需任何其他设置或配置。也可以导入QML文件的远程目录，但是需要存在列出 qmldir 文件的目录。本地目录可以选择包含目录列表 qmldir 文件，以便定义应提供给导入目录的客户端的类型名称，并指定应可供进口商使用的JavaScript资源。

trans-unit.source: A local file system directory may optionally include a qmldir file. This allows the engine to only expose certain QML types to clients who import the directory. Additionally, JavaScript resources in the directory are not exposed to clients unless they are declared in a qmldir file.
trans-unit.target: 本地文件系统目录可以选择包含 qmldir 文件。这允许引擎仅向导入目录的客户端公开某些QML类型。此外，除非在 qmldir 文件中声明，否则目录中的JavaScript资源不会公开给客户端。

trans-unit.source: A local name can never be an empty string, although the prefix and namespace URI can. If the prefix is not empty, the namespace URI cannot be empty. Local names and prefixes must be valid NCNames, e.g.,

trans-unit.source: A main window provides a framework for building an application's user interface. Qt has QMainWindow and its related classes for main window management. trans-unit.source: A menu widget is a selection menu. It can be either a pull-down menu in a menu bar or a standalone context menu. Pull-down menus are shown by the menu bar when the user clicks on the respective item or presses the specified shortcut key. Use QMenuBar::addMenu() to insert a menu into a menu bar. Context menus are usually invoked by some special keyboard key or by right-clicking. They can be executed either asynchronously with popup() or synchronously with exec(). Menus can also be invoked in response to button presses; these are just like context menus except for how they are invoked.
trans-unit.target: 菜单小部件是选择菜单。它可以是菜单栏中的下拉菜单，也可以是独立的上下文菜单。当用户单击相应项目或按下指定的快捷键时，菜单栏会显示下拉菜单。使用QMenuBar :: addMenu（）将菜单插入菜单栏。上下文菜单通常通过某些特殊的键盘键或右键单击来调用。它们可以与popup（）异步执行，也可以与exec（）同步执行。也可以响应按钮的按下来调用菜单。这些与上下文菜单一样，只是它们的调用方式不同。

trans-unit.source: A message box displays a primary text to alert the user to a situation, an informative text to further explain the alert or to ask the user a question, and an optional detailed text to provide even more data if the user requests it. trans-unit.target: 消息框显示用于向用户发出警报的主要文本，用于进一步说明警报或询问用户问题的信息性文本，以及用于在用户请求时提供更多数据的可选详细文本。消息框还可以显示一个图标和用于接受用户响应的标准按钮。

trans-unit.source: A message dialog is used to inform the user, or ask the user a question. A message dialog displays a primary text to alert the user to a situation, an informative text to further explain the alert or to ask the user a question, and an optional detailed text to provide even more data if the user requests it. A message box can also display a configurable set of buttons for accepting a user response.
trans-unit.target: 消息对话框用于通知用户或向用户提问。消息对话框显示主要文本，以警告用户注意某种情况；提供信息的文本，以进一步说明警报或询问用户问题；以及可选的详细文本，以在用户请求时提供更多数据。消息框还可以显示一组可配置的按钮，用于接受用户响应。

A modeless dialog is a dialog that operates independently of other content around the dialog. When a modeless dialog is opened, the user is allowed to interact with both the dialog and the other content in the same window.
trans-unit.target: 无模型对话框是一个独立于对话框周围其他内容运行的对话框,当打开一个无模型对话框时,用户可以在同一窗口中与对话框和其他内容进行交互。当一个无模型对话框被打开时,用户可以在同一个窗口中同时与该对话框和其他内容进行交互。

trans-unit.source: A modeless dialog:
trans-unit.target: 无模型对话框。

trans-unit.source: A modeless progress dialog is suitable for operations that take place in the background, where the user is able to interact with the application. Such operations are typically based on QTimer (or QObject::timerEvent()) or QSocketNotifier; or performed in a separate thread. A QProgressBar in the status bar of your main window is often an alternative to a modeless progress dialog.
trans-unit.target: 无模式进度对话框适用于在后台进行的操作，用户可以在其中与应用程序进行交互。这样的操作通常基于QTimer（或QObject :: timerEvent（））或QSocketNotifier；或在单独的线程中执行。一个QProgressBar在主窗口的状态栏通常是无模式进度对话框的替代品。

trans-unit.source: A modified window is a window whose content has changed but has not been saved to disk. This flag will have different effects varied by the platform. On macOS the close button will have a modified look; on other platforms, the window title will have an '*' (asterisk).
trans-unit.target: 修改后的窗口是内容已更改但尚未保存到磁盘的窗口。该标志将因平台而异。在macOS上，关闭按钮的外观会有所修改；在其他平台上，窗口标题将带有“ *”（星号）。

trans-unit.source: A modified window is a window whose content has changed but has not been saved to disk. This flag will have different effects varied by the platform. On macOS the close button will have a modified look; on other platforms, the window title will have an '*' (asterisk).

A monoblock device sitting at rest, face up on a desk will experience a force of approximately 9.8 on the Z axis (ie. towards the roof). This is the proper acceleration the device experiences relative to freefall.
trans-unit.target: 静止不动的单体装置,面朝上放在桌子上,在Z轴上将经历大约9.8的力(即朝向屋顶)。这是设备相对于自由落体的适当加速度。

A more elaborate approach than just alerting the user to an event is to also ask the user what to do about it. Store the question in the informative text property, and specify the buttons property to the set of buttons you want as the set of user responses. The buttons are specified by combining values using the bitwise OR operator. The display order for the buttons is platform dependent.
trans-unit.target: 除了仅警告用户事件之外，一种更复杂的方法是还询问用户该怎么做。将问题存储在信息丰富的文本属性中，并将按钮属性指定为所需的按钮集作为用户响应集。通过使用按位或运算符组合值来指定按钮。按钮的显示顺序取决于平台。

trans-unit.source: A more naive comparison algorithm might incorrectly return true on all versions of macOS, including Mac OS 9. This behavior is achieved by overloading the comparison operators to return false whenever the OS types of the QOperatingSystemVersion instances being compared do not match. Be aware that due to this it can be the case x >= y and x < y are BOTH false for the same instances of x and y.
trans-unit.target: 较幼稚的比较算法可能会在包括Mac OS 9在内的所有macOS版本上错误地返回true ，这是通过在比较的QOperatingSystemVersion实例的操作系统类型不匹配时使比较运算符重载来返回 false 来实现的。请注意，由于这一点，可以是这种情况 x > = y和 x <Y均为 false 对于相同实例 x 和 y 。

trans-unit.source: A more naive comparison algorithm might incorrectly return true on all versions of macOS, including Mac OS 9. This behavior is achieved by overloading the comparison operators to return false whenever the OS types of the QOperatingSystemVersion instances being compared do not match. Be aware that due to this it can be the case x >= y and x < y are BOTH false for the same instances of x and y.

trans-unit.source: A mouse event contains a special accept flag that indicates whether the receiver wants the event. You should call ignore() if the mouse event is not handled by your widget. A mouse event is propagated up the parent widget chain until a widget accepts it with accept(), or an event filter consumes it.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标事件包含一个特殊的接受标志，该标志指示接收者是否想要该事件。如果小部件未处理鼠标事件，则应调用ignore（）。鼠标事件将在父窗口小部件链上传播，直到窗口小部件使用accept（）接受它，或者事件过滤器将其消耗掉为止。

A mouse plugin can be created by subclassing QGenericPlugin and reimplementing the pure virtual create() function. By exporting the derived class using the Q_PLUGIN_METADATA() macro, The default implementation of the QGenericPluginFactory class will automatically detect the plugin and load the driver into the server application at run-time. See How to Create Qt Plugins for details.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过子类化QGenericPlugin并重新实现纯虚拟create（）函数来创建鼠标插件。通过使用Q_PLUGIN_METADATA（）宏导出派生类，QGenericPluginFactory类的默认实现将自动检测插件，并在运行时将驱动程序加载到服务器应用程序中。有关详细信息，请参见如何创建Qt插件。

trans-unit.source: A mouse plugin can be created by subclassing QGenericPlugin and reimplementing the pure virtual create() function. trans-unit.source: A non-computing example of a semaphore would be dining at a restaurant. A semaphore is initialized with the number of chairs in the restaurant. As people arrive, they want a seat. As seats are filled, available() is decremented. As people leave, the available() is incremented, allowing more people to enter. If a party of 10 people want to be seated, but there are only 9 seats, those 10 people will wait, but a party of 4 people would be seated (taking the available seats to 5, making the party of 10 people wait longer).
trans-unit.target: 信号量的非计算示例是在餐厅用餐。使用餐厅中的椅子数量初始化信号量。当人们到达时，他们想要一个座位。填充座位后，可用（）会减少。当人们离开时，可用（）会增加，从而允许更多人进入。如果要坐10人的宴会，但只有9个席位，则这10人将等待，但要坐4人的宴会（将可用座位增加到5，使10人的宴会等待更长的时间） 。

trans-unit.source: A notation node does not have any parent.

trans-unit.source: A note about arguments: Our experience shows that signals and slots are more reusable if they do not use special types. If QScrollBar::valueChanged() were to use a special type such as the hypothetical QScrollBar::Range, it could only be connected to slots designed specifically for QScrollBar. Connecting different input widgets together would be impossible.
trans-unit.target: 关于参数的注释：我们的经验表明，如果信号和插槽不使用特殊类型，则它们将更可重用。如果QScrollBar :: valueChanged（）使用特殊的类型，例如假设的QScrollBar :: Range，则只能将其连接到专门为QScrollBar设计的插槽。将不同的输入小部件连接在一起是不可能的。

trans-unit.source: A note on logical vs physical dots per inch: physical DPI is based on the actual physical pixel sizes when available, and is useful for print preview and other cases where it's desirable to know the exact physical dimensions of screen displayed contents.
trans-unit.target: 关于逻辑与物理每英寸点数的说明:物理DPI是基于实际的物理像素尺寸(如果有的话),对于打印预览和其他需要了解屏幕显示内容的确切物理尺寸的情况是有用的。

trans-unit.source: A null line will not be rescaled. For non-null lines with very short lengths (represented by denormal floating-point values), results may be imprecise.

A number followed by a measurement unit. The CSS standard recommends that user agents must ignore a declaration with an illegal value. In Qt, it is mandatory to specify measurement units. trans-unit.target: 一些

trans-unit.source: A number of attributes control the visual appearance of the preedit string (the visual appearance of text outside the preedit string is controlled by the widget only). The AttributeType enum describes the different attributes that can be set.
trans-unit.target: 许多属性控制预编辑字符串的视觉外观（预编辑字符串之外的文本的视觉外观仅由窗口小部件控制）。该属性类型枚举描述了可以设置不同的属性。

A numerical representation of seconds elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00Z.

A page can be loaded using load() or setUrl(). Alternatively, if you have the HTML content readily available, you can use setHtml(). The GET method is always used to load URLs.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用load（）或setUrl（）加载页面。另外，如果您可以随时获取HTML内容，则可以使用setHtml（）。GET方法始终用于加载URL。

trans-unit.source: A page entered directly from a commit page has its Back button disabled.
trans-unit.target: 直接从提交页面输入的页面的“ 后退”按钮被禁用。

trans-unit.source: A page has the following attributes, which are rendered by QWizard: a title, a subTitle, and a set of pixmaps. See Elements of a Wizard Page for details. Once a page is added to the wizard (using QWizard::addPage() or QWizard::setPage()), wizard() returns a pointer to the associated QWizard object.
trans-unit.target: 页面具有以下属性，这些属性由QWizard呈现：标题，子标题和一组pixmaps。有关详细信息，请参见向导页面的元素。将页面添加到向导后（使用QWizard :: addPage（）或QWizard :: setPage（）），向导（）将返回指向关联的QWizard对象的指针。

trans-unit.source: A page in the Discarded state can only transition to the Active state. This will cause a reload of the page.
A page tab that the user can select to switch to a different page in a dialog.
trans-unit.target: 一个页面标签,用户可以选择在对话框中切换到不同的页面。

trans-unit.source: A pager.
trans-unit.target: 一个传呼机。

trans-unit.source: A paint context is used when rendering custom layouts for QTextDocuments with the QAbstractTextDocumentLayout::draw() function. It is specified by a cursor position, default text color, clip rectangle and a collection of selections.
trans-unit.target: 当使用QAbstractTextDocumentLayout :: draw（）函数为QTextDocuments渲染自定义布局时，使用绘制上下文。它由光标位置，默认文本颜色，剪辑矩形和选择集指定。

trans-unit.source: A paint device is an abstraction of a two-dimensional space that can be drawn on using a QPainter. Its default coordinate system has its origin located at the top-left position. X increases to the right and Y increases downwards. The unit is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 绘制设备是可以使用QPainter绘制的二维空间的抽象。其默认坐标系的原点位于左上角。X向右增加，Y向下方增加。单位是一个像素。

trans-unit.source: A paint engine must update every dirty state.
trans-unit.target: 油漆引擎必须每脏状态更新一次。

trans-unit.source: A paint event is a request to repaint all or part of a widget. It can happen for one of the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: 绘制事件是重新绘制全部或部分小组件的请求。它可能因以下原因之一而发生。

trans-unit.source: A painter path is an object composed of a number of graphical building blocks, such as rectangles, ellipses, lines, and curves. Building blocks can be joined in closed subpaths, for example as a rectangle or an ellipse. A closed path has coinciding start and end points. Or they can exist independently as unclosed subpaths, such as lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: 一个画家路径是由一些图形构件组成的对象,如矩形、椭圆、线条和曲线。构件可以连接在封闭的子路径中,例如作为一个矩形或椭圆。一个封闭的路径有重合的起点和终点。或者它们可以作为非封闭的子路径独立存在,如线和曲线。

trans-unit.source: A painter path is an object composed of lines and curves. For example, a rectangle is composed by lines and an ellipse is composed by curves.
trans-unit.target: 画家路径是由线条和曲线组成的对象。例如,一个矩形是由线条组成的,一个椭圆是由曲线组成的。

trans-unit.source: A pair of glasses.
trans-unit.target: 一副眼镜。

trans-unit.source: A palette consists of three color groups:
trans-unit.target: 一个调色板由三组颜色组成。

trans-unit.source: A palette consists of three color groups: Active, Disabled, and Inactive. Active color group is the default group, its colors are used for other groups if colors of these groups aren't explicitly specified.
A paragraph of text (usually found in documents).
trans-unit.target: 一段文字(通常出现在文件中);

trans-unit.source: A parameter can be unset by setting an invalid QVariant. Unsetting a parameter implies that the configuration is reset to its default setting.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置无效的QVariant来取消设置参数。取消设置参数意味着将配置重置为其默认设置。

trans-unit.source: A part of the document or web page that is complementary to the main content, usually a landmark (see WAI-ARIA).
trans-unit.target: 文件或网页中与主要内容相辅相成的部分,通常是一个里程碑(见WAI-ARIA)。

trans-unit.source: A partial match must be explicitly requested by specifying a match type of PartialPreferCompleteMatch or PartialPreferFirstMatch when calling QRegularExpression::match or QRegularExpression::globalMatch. If a partial match is found, then calling the hasMatch() function on the QRegularExpressionMatch object returned by match() will return false, but hasPartialMatch() will return true.
trans-unit.target: 在调用QRegularExpression :: match或QRegularExpression :: globalMatch时，必须通过指定PartialPreferCompleteMatch或PartialPreferFirstMatch的匹配类型来显式请求部分匹配。如果局部发现匹配，然后调用hasMatch（）的函数上QRegularExpressionMatch通过返回的对象匹配（）将返回 false ，但hasPartialMatch（）将返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: A particular look and feel might use smooth scrolling (eg. using SmoothedAnimation), might have a visible scrollbar, or a scrollbar that fades in to show location, etc.
A particular look-and-feel might use smooth scrolling (eg. using SmoothedAnimation), might have a visible scrollbar, or a scrollbar that fades in to show location, etc.

trans-unit.source: A particular manager may support one or more visibility scopes. For example a manager from one provider may only provide places that are public to everyone, whilst another may provide both public and private places.
trans-unit.target: 一个特定的管理者可以支持一个或多个可视范围。例如,一个供应商的经理可能只提供对所有人公开的场所,而另一个供应商可能同时提供公共和私人场所。

A percent bar series.

trans-unit.source: A pie chart.
trans-unit.target: 一个饼图。

trans-unit.source: A pie legend marker is related to QPieSeries. With a pie series, each slice of the pie is related to one marker in the legend.
trans-unit.target: 饼图标记与QPieSeries有关。对于馅饼系列，馅饼的每个切片都与图例中的一个标记相关。

trans-unit.source: A pie series consists of slices that are defined as QPieSlice objects. The slices can have any values as the QPieSeries object calculates the percentage of a slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.
trans-unit.target: 饼图系列由定义为QPieSlice对象的切片组成。切片可以具有任何值，因为QPieSeries对象计算切片的百分比与系列中所有切片的总和之比，以确定图表中切片的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: A pie series consists of slices that are defined as QPieSlice objects. The slices can have any values as the QPieSeries object calculates the percentage of a slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.

A pie series consists of slices that are defined using the PieSlice type. The slices can have any values as the PieSeries type calculates the percentage of a slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.
trans-unit.target: 饼图系列由使用PieSlice类型定义的切片组成。切片可以具有任何值，因为PieSeries类型计算切片的百分比与系列中所有切片的总和之比，以确定图表中切片的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: A pie series consists of slices that are defined using the PieSlice type. The slices can have any values as the PieSeries type calculates the percentage of a slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.
A pie series.
trans-unit.target: 一派系列。

trans-unit.source: A pie slice has a value and a label. When the slice is added to a pie series, the PieSeries type calculates the percentage of the slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.
trans-unit.target: 饼图切片具有一个值和一个标签。当将切片添加到饼图系列时，PieSeries类型将计算该切片与该系列中所有切片的总和相比的百分比，以确定图表中切片的实际大小。

trans-unit.source: A pie slice has a value and a label. When the slice is added to a pie series, the QPieSeries object calculates the percentage of the slice compared with the sum of all slices in the series to determine the actual size of the slice in the chart.

trans-unit.source: A pinch gesture is a form of touch user input in which the user typically touches two points on the input device with a thumb and finger, before moving them closer together or further apart to change the scale factor, zoom, or level of detail of the user interface.
trans-unit.target: 捏手势是触摸用户输入的一种形式,用户通常用拇指和手指触摸输入设备上的两个点,然后再将它们移近或进一步分开,以改变用户界面的比例系数、缩放或细节水平。

trans-unit.source: A ping request for <a ping>.
trans-unit.target: 对<a ping>的ping请求。

trans-unit.source: A pixmap
trans-unit.target: 像素图

trans-unit.source: A pixmap can be used to represent the data while the drag is in progress, and will move with the cursor to the drop target. This pixmap typically shows an icon that represents the MIME type of the data being transferred, but any pixmap can be set with setPixmap(). The cursor's hot spot can be given a position relative to the top-left corner of the pixmap with the setHotSpot() function. The following code positions the pixmap so that the cursor's hot spot points to the center of its bottom edge:
trans-unit.target: 像素图可用于在拖动过程中表示数据，并将随光标移动到放置目标。此像素图通常显示一个表示要传输的数据的MIME类型的图标，但是可以使用setPixmap（）设置任何像素图。可以通过setHotSpot（）函数为光标的热点指定相对于像素图左上角的位置。以下代码对像素图进行定位，以使光标的热点指向其底边的中心：

trans-unit.source: A pixmap is automatically detached by Qt whenever its contents are about to change. This is done in almost all QPixmap member functions that modify the pixmap (fill(), fromImage(), load(), etc.), and in QPainter::begin() on a pixmap.
trans-unit.target: 每当Qt的内容即将更改时，它都会自动分离像素图。几乎所有修改像素图的QPixmap成员函数（fill（），fromImage（），load（）等）以及像素图上的QPainter :: begin（）都可以完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: A place attribute stores an additional piece of information about a Place that is not otherwise exposed through the Place type. A PlaceAttribute is a textual piece of data, accessible through the text property, and a label. Both the text and label properties are intended to be displayed to the user. PlaceAttributes are stored in an ExtendedAttributes map with a unique key.
trans-unit.target: 地点属性存储有关该地点的其他信息，否则该信息不会通过“ 地点”类型公开。一个PlaceAttribute是文字部分的数据，通过访问文本属性和标签。无论是文字和标签的属性旨在显示给用户。 PlaceAttributes 使用唯一键存储在ExtendedAttributes映射中。

trans-unit.source: A place attribute stores an additional piece of information about a Place that is not otherwise exposed through the Place type. A PlaceAttribute is a textual piece of data, accessible through the text property, and a label. Both the text and label properties are intended to be displayed to the user. PlaceAttributes are stored in an ExtendedAttributes map with a unique key.

A place generally cannot be saved directly between managers as is because it contains manager specific data such as icons and categories. In order to facilitate saving to one's own manager, engine implementers should implement the QPlaceManagerEngine::compatiblePlace() function. This function returns a copy of the input place with properties pruned or modified as necessary such that the copy can be saved into manager.
trans-unit.target: 通常，不能直接在管理者之间保存位置，因为该位置包含管理者特定的数据，例如图标和类别。为了便于保存到自己的管理器中，引擎实现者应实现QPlaceManagerEngine :: compatiblePlace（）函数。此函数返回输入位置的副本，该副本具有根据需要修剪或修改的属性，以便可以将副本保存到管理器中。

trans-unit.source: A place is a point of interest, it could be a favorite restaurant, a park or someone's home. A QPlace object represents a place by acting as a container for various information about that place.
trans-unit.target: 一个景点是一个景点，它可能是最喜欢的餐馆，公园或某人的家。甲QPlace对象表示通过作为关于该地点的各种信息的容器的地方。

trans-unit.source: A place is a point of interest, it could be a favorite restaurant, a park or someone's home. A QPlace object represents a place by acting as a container for various information about that place.
A place that has been returned from a search request may have more details that can be fetched. The following demonstrates how to check if there are further details and if so how to request them.
trans-unit.target: 从搜索请求中返回的地方可能有更多的细节可以获取。下面演示了如何检查是否有更多的细节,如果有,如何请求。

trans-unit.source: A places backend implementer needs to derive from QPlaceManagerEngine and provide implementations for the virtual functions relevant for their backend. Most of these functions are asynchronous and so implementers will also need to derive the appropriate reply classes. The reply objects are responsible for managing an asynchronous request; they are used to notify when a request is complete and hold the results of that request. QPlaceManagerEngine provides a default implementation for all virtual functions. The default implementations for the asynchronous functions return a reply that will emit the error() and finished() signals at the next iteration through the event loop.
trans-unit.target: 场所后端实现者需要从QPlaceManagerEngine派生并提供与其后端相关的虚拟功能的实现。这些函数大多数都是异步的，因此实现者还需要派生适当的答复类。回复对象负责管理异步请求；它们用于通知请求完成的时间并保留该请求的结果。QPlaceManagerEngine为所有虚拟功能提供默认实现。异步函数的默认实现返回一个应答，该应答将在通过事件循环的下一次迭代时发出error（）和finish（）信号。

trans-unit.source: A plain QWidget.
trans-unit.target: 一个普通的QWidget。

trans-unit.source: A plain QWidget.
A plain line.
trans-unit.target: 一条朴素的线。

trans-unit.source: A platform specific panel has been requested.
trans-unit.target: 已要求建立一个平台专用小组。

trans-unit.target: 插件实现应从QTextToSpeechPlugin派生，并重新实现createTextToSpeechEngine（）。

trans-unit.source: A plug-in implementation should derive from QTextToSpeechPlugin and re-implement createTextToSpeechEngine().

A plugin implementer needs to subclass QGeoPositionInfoSourceFactory and override one or more of its functions. If a plugin does not support a specific feature the function should return 0 or utilize the default implementation.
trans-unit.target: 插件实现者需要继承QGeoPositionInfoSourceFactory的子类，并覆盖其一个或多个函数。如果插件不支持特定功能，则该函数应返回0或使用默认实现。

trans-unit.source: A plugin.
trans-unit.target: 一个插件。

trans-unit.source: A point exactly in the middle of the currently-pressed touch points. If only one point is pressed, it's the same as that point. A handler that has a target will normally transform it relative to this point.
trans-unit.target: 恰好在当前按下的触摸点中间的一个点。如果仅按下一个点，则与该点相同。具有目标的处理程序通常会相对于此点对其进行转换。

trans-unit.source: A point exactly in the middle of the currently-pressed touch points. The target will be rotated around this point.
trans-unit.target: 恰好在当前按下的触摸点中间的一个点。该目标将围绕此点旋转。

trans-unit.source: A point is specified by a x coordinate and an y coordinate which can be accessed using the x() and y() functions. The isNull() function returns true if both x and y are set to 0. The coordinates can be set (or altered) using the setX() and setY() functions, or alternatively the rx() and ry() functions which return references to the coordinates (allowing direct manipulation).
trans-unit.target: 一个点由x坐标和y坐标指定，可以使用x（）和y（）函数进行访问。该参考isNull（）函数返回 true ，如果x和y是使用设置为0的坐标可设置（或改变）setX的（）和SETY（）函数，或可替代地，RX（）和RY（）函数，其返回引用坐标（允许直接操纵）。

trans-unit.source: A point is specified by a x coordinate and an y coordinate which can be accessed using the x() and y() functions. The coordinates of the point are specified using floating point numbers for accuracy. The isNull() function returns true if both x and y are set to 0.0. The coordinates can be set (or altered) using the setX() and setY() functions, or alternatively the rx() and ry() functions which return references to the coordinates (allowing direct manipulation).
trans-unit.target: 一个点由x坐标和y坐标指定，可以使用x（）和y（）函数进行访问。为了精确起见，使用浮点数指定了点的坐标。所述参考isNull（）函数返回 true ，如果x和y被设定为0.0。可以使用setX（）和setY（）函数，或者使用rx（）和ry（）函数来设置（或更改）坐标，这些函数可以返回对坐标的引用（允许直接操作）。

trans-unit.source: A point light
trans-unit.target: 点灯

trans-unit.source: A point light is a light source that emits light in all directions, from a single point. Conceptually, this is similar to light given off by a standard light bulb.

A point light uses three attenuation factors to describe how the intensity of the light decreases over distance. These factors are designed to be used together in calcuating total attenuation. For the materials in Qt3D Extras the following formula is used, where distance is the distance from the light to the surface being rendered:

trans-unit.source: A popup widget is a special top-level widget that sets the Qt::WType_Popup widget flag, e.g. the QMenu widget. When the application opens a popup widget, all events are sent to the popup. Normal widgets and modal widgets cannot be accessed before the popup widget is closed.

trans-unit.source: A post-processing effect

A post-processing effect is conceptually very similar to Qt Quick's ShaderEffect item. When an effect is present, the scene is rendered into a separate texture first. The effect is then applied by drawing a textured quad to the main render target, depending on the render mode of the View3D. The effect can provide a vertex shader, a fragment shader, or both. Effects are always applied on the entire scene, per View3D.
A posterize filter.
trans-unit.target: 一个后置过滤器。

trans-unit.source: A postprocessing step to optimize the scene hierarchy.
A postprocessing step to reduce the number of meshes.

trans-unit.source: A primary function of the sprite engine is its internal state machine. This is not the same as the states and transitions in Qt Quick, and is more like a conventional state machine. Sprites can have weighted transitions to other sprites, or back to themselves. When a sprite animation finishes, the sprite engine will choose the next sprite randomly, based on the weighted transitions available for the sprite that just finished.
trans-unit.target: 魍魉引擎的一个主要功能是其内部的状态机。这与Qt Quick中的状态和转换不同,更像是一个传统的状态机。魍魉可以有加权转场到其他魍魉,或者回到自己。当一个精灵动画完成时,精灵引擎会根据刚刚完成的精灵可用的加权转场随机选择下一个精灵。

trans-unit.source: A process's environment is composed of a set of key=value pairs known as environment variables. The QProcessEnvironment class wraps that concept and allows easy manipulation of those variables. It's meant to be used along with QProcess, to set the environment for child processes. It cannot be used to change the current process's environment.

trans-unit.source: A property has a name() and a type(), as well as various attributes that specify its behavior: isReadable(), isWritable(), isDesignable(), isScriptable(), revision(), and isStored().

A property is an attribute of an object that can be assigned a static value or bound to a dynamic expression. A property's value can be read by other objects. Generally it can also be modified by another object, unless a particular QML type has explicitly disallowed this for a specific property.

trans-unit.source: A qualified name is the raw name of an attribute in the XML data. It consists of the namespace prefix(), followed by colon, followed by the attribute's local name(). Since the namespace prefix is not unique (the same prefix can point to different namespaces and different prefixes can point to the same namespace), you shouldn't use qualifiedName(), but the resolved namespaceUri() and the attribute's local name().
trans-unit.target: 限定名称是XML数据中属性的原始名称。它由名称空间前缀（），冒号和属性的本地名称（）组成。由于名称空间前缀不是唯一的（相同的前缀可以指向不同的名称空间，并且不同的前缀可以指向相同的名称空间），因此不应使用qualifiedName（），而应使用解析的namespaceUri（）和属性的本地名称（）。

trans-unit.source: A qualified name is the raw name of an element in the XML data. It consists of the namespace prefix, followed by colon, followed by the element's local name. Since the namespace prefix is not unique (the same prefix can point to different namespaces and different prefixes can point to the same namespace), you shouldn't use qualifiedName(), but the resolved namespaceUri() and the attribute's local name().
trans-unit.target: 合格名称是XML数据中元素的原始名称。它由名称空间前缀，冒号，元素的本地名称组成。由于名称空间前缀不是唯一的（相同的前缀可以指向不同的名称空间，并且不同的前缀可以指向相同的名称空间），因此不应使用qualifiedName（），而应使用解析的namespaceUri（）和属性的本地名称（）。

trans-unit.source: A quantifier specifies the number of occurrences of an expression that must be matched. x{1,1} means match one and only one x. x{1,5} means match a sequence of x characters that contains at least one x but no more than five.
trans-unit.target: 量词指定必须匹配的表达式的出现次数。x {1,1}表示只匹配一个x。x {1,5}表示匹配包含至少一个x但不超过五个的x个字符序列。

trans-unit.source: A queue is a first in, first out (FIFO) structure. Items are added to the tail of the queue using enqueue() and retrieved from the head using dequeue(). The head() function provides access to the head item without removing it.

trans-unit.source: A read-write lock is a synchronization tool for protecting resources that can be accessed for reading and writing. This type of lock is useful if you want to allow multiple threads to have simultaneous read-only access, but as soon as one thread wants to write to the resource, all other threads must be blocked until the writing is complete.
trans-unit.target: 读写锁是一种同步工具,用于保护可以进行读写访问的资源。如果你想允许多个线程同时进行只读访问,但只要有一个线程想对资源进行写入,其他所有线程都必须被阻止,直到写入完成,那么这种类型的锁就很有用。

trans-unit.source: A reference sequence is read and written via QMetaObject::property() and thus is read and written as a QVariant. This means that changing the value of any element in the sequence from JavaScript will result in three steps occurring: the complete sequence will be read from the QObject (as a QVariant, but then cast to a sequence of the correct type); the element at the specified index will be changed in that sequence; and the complete sequence will be written back to the QObject (as a QVariant).

A reference sequence is read and written via QMetaObject::property() and thus is read and written as a QVariant. This means that changing the value of any element in the sequence from JavaScript will result in three steps occurring: the complete sequence will be read from the QObject (as a QVariant, but then cast to a sequence of the correct type); the element at the specified index will be changed in that sequence; and the complete sequence will be written back to the QObject (as a QVariant).
trans-unit.target: 通过QMetaObject :: property（）读取和写入参考序列，因此将其作为QVariant读取和写入。这意味着从JavaScript更改序列中任何元素的值将导致发生三个步骤：完整的序列将从QObject中读取（作为QVariant，然后转换为正确类型的序列）；指定索引处的元素将按该顺序更改；并将完整序列写回到QObject（作为QVariant）。

trans-unit.source: A remote object replica is a surrogate object that has (approximately) the same API as the SourceQObject it is replicating. There are a few additional properties and signals to make it possible to detect when the Replica is initialized or if it loses its connection to the Source object. There are a few other differences: a constant property on the source cannot be constant on the replica. The value will not be known at the time the replica is instantiated, it will only be known once the replica is initialized (see Remote Object Interaction).
trans-unit.target: 远程对象副本是一个替代对象，它具有与其复制的源QObject大约（相同）的API 。还有一些其他属性和信号，使您可以检测副本服务器何时初始化，或者它是否失去与Source对象的连接。还有其他一些区别：源上的常量属性在副本上不能常量。在实例化副本时，将不知道该值，只有在副本被初始化后才知道（请参阅Remote Object Interaction）。
